lines.text: The Chinese have a strange way of finding out things that we miss.
Then you think he killed Hilary Galt?
No, my friend, that is not proof. One never knows what lies behind the curtain.
You see, we explorers are always searching, reaching out into the darkness for something that is just beyond our reach.
Maybe, John, what we both want is just beyond our reach.
I need not say that I rely upon your honor, Colonel.
You shall have no reason... to doubt it.
Fear and love, my good friend, make their own destiny. I have arranged tonight that fear and love shall meet.
I have no heart for this lecture tonight. The desert is too full of memories.
The desert gives, and the desert takes away.
What no man speaks, no man knows.
